channel.title: <![CDATA[ Gremlin RSS Feed ]]>
channel.description: <![CDATA[ Prevent outages, innovate faster, and earn customer trust with Gremlin’s Reliability Management and Chaos Engineering platform. ]]>

item.title: 【Three key facts about serverless reliability】有关无服务器可靠性的三个关键事实
item.description: 【Serverless means not managing servers, but you still need to consider reliability. In our latest blog, learn why and how to build resilient serverless applications.】无服务器意味着不管理服务器，但是您仍然需要考虑可靠性。在我们的最新博客中，了解为什么以及如何构建弹性无服务器应用程序。

item.title: 【Ensuring your AI systems can scale to meet demand】确保您的AI系统可以扩展以满足需求
item.description: 【Demand for AI services is ever-increasing. Are your systems prepared? This blog teaches you how to prepare for sudden demand surges.】对AI服务的需求正在越来越多。您的系统准备好了吗？该博客教您如何为突然的需求激增做准备。

item.title: 【Test serverless and application-level reliability with Failure Flags】使用故障标志测试无服务器和应用程序级可靠性
item.description: 【Run resilience tests at the application level in serverless, container, Kubernetes, and service mesh environments with Gremlin Failure Flags.】使用Gremlin故障标志的无服务器，容器，Kubernetes和服务网格环境中的应用程序级别运行弹性测试。

item.title: 【Infographic: Resilience and reliability in the cloud】信息图：云中的韧性和可靠性
item.description: 【Created in partnership with AWS, this infographic shows the impact of outages, the most common causes of outages, and the results companies get from investing in resilience.】该信息图与AWS合作创建，显示了中断的影响，最常见的中断原因以及公司从投资弹性中获得的结果。

item.title: 【How to make your AI-as-a-Service more resilient】如何使您的AI-AS-A-Service更具弹性
item.description: 【Getting an AI-powered service up and running is hard; keeping it running is even harder. Read how AI-as-a-service systems can fail and how Gremlin makes them reliable.】启动和运行AI驱动的服务很难；保持它的运行更加困难。阅读AI-AS-AS-Service系统如何失败以及Gremlin如何使其可靠。

item.title: 【Three reliability best practices when using AI agents for coding】使用AI代理进行编码时，三种可靠性最佳实践
item.description: 【AI agents can help developers move faster, but they can also introduce potential failures into your system. Find out best practices for reliability to keep human and AI errors from causing outages.】AI代理可以帮助开发人员更快地移动，但他们也可以将潜在的故障引入您的系统。找出可靠性的最佳实践，以防止人类和AI错误引起中断。

item.title: 【Simulating artificial intelligence (AI) service outages with Gremlin】与Gremlin模拟人工智能（AI）服务中断
item.description: 【Learn how to leverage artificial intelligence (AI) services while avoiding downtime caused by outages.】了解如何利用人工智能（AI）服务，同时避免停机时间。

item.title: 【Announcing Gremlin Private Edition】宣布Gremlin私人版
item.description: 【Gremlin Private Edition is a private, secure, self-hosted Gremlin instance that runs entirely within your network. Learn more in our announcement blog.】Gremlin Private Edition是一个私人，安全，自主的Gremlin实例，完全在您的网络中运行。在我们的公告博客中了解更多信息。

item.title: 【How the Gremlin agent fails safely】Gremlin代理如何安全失败
item.description: 【Reliability testing shouldn’t feel risky. Learn how Gremlin makes testing safer with fail-safe agents and automatic rollbacks.】可靠性测试不应该感到冒险。了解Gremlin如何通过故障安全代理和自动回滚使测试更安全。

item.title: 【How a major retailer tested critical serverless systems with Failure Flags】主要零售商如何用故障标志测试关键服务器系统
item.description: 【Find out how Gremlin helped a major retailer test region failover for a critical service built on AWS Lambda using Failure Flags.】找出Gremlin如何帮助使用故障标志在AWS Lambda建立的关键服务的主要零售商测试区域故障转移。
